content.title: Medhavi Chhatr/Chhatra Shiksha Protsahan Yojana
content.beneficiary: Students studying in 10th, 12th, graduation, post graduation, and some selected courses
content.details: Chhattisgarh 'Medhaavee Chhaatr/ Chhaatra Shiksha Protsaahan Yojana' has been started by the Government of Chhattisgarh and operated by the Labor Department of Chhattisgarh. Benefits will be provided to applicants studying in 10th, 12th, graduation, post graduation, and some selected courses.
benefits: Annual Incentive Amount for Class 10th & 12th: ₹ 5,000/- for boys and ₹ 5,500/- for girls
Annual Incentive Amount for All Graduate Courses: ₹ 7,500/- for both boys and girls
Annual Incentive Amount for All Post Graduate Courses: ₹ 10,000/- for boys and ₹ 10,500/- for girls
Annual Incentive Amount for vocational education: ₹ 12,000/- for boys and ₹ 12,500/- for girls
Reimbursement of admission fees and academic expenses for students in government institutions
eligibility: Applicant should be resident of Chhattisgarh
First two children from a family
Children who score more than 75 percent marks will get the benefit of the scheme
Beneficiaries will be eligible for the benefits of this scheme after 90 days of registration
content.application_process: Offline. Registered construction workers can apply through any CSC center or labor office. Get the application form, fill out with required details, and attach the necessary documents.
documents_required: Marksheet of the student in the previous year's class
Certificate issued by the Principal of studying in the current session

faqs.question: What is this scheme?
faqs.answer: Chhattisgarh state Government started a scheme 'Medhavi Chhatr/ Chhatra Shiksha Protsahan Yojana' for education.

faqs.question: What is the benefits of the scheme?
What is the eligibility criteria?
faqs.answer: The benefit of the scheme will be given to the first two children of registered factory workers of the state. Among the first two children of registered workers, those children who score more than 75 percent marks will get the benefit of the scheme. Beneficiaries will be eligible for the benefits of this scheme after 90 days of registration.

faqs.question: For how many children can the applicant avail the benefit of this scheme?
What is the marks eligibility criteria in previous class to get scholarship?
faqs.answer: Those children who score more than 75 percent marks will get the benefit of the scheme.

faqs.question: For which classes/course student will get the scholarship?
faqs.answer: Students will get the scholarship from class 1st to 12th, Graduation, Post Graduation and some selected courses.

faqs.question: How to apply for the scholarship?
faqs.answer: The registered construction worker can submit the online application through labor office of the concerned area.

faqs.question: What documents are required?
faqs.answer: Labor Registration Certificate (Guardian), Aadhar card, Bank account details, Permanent residence certificate, Marksheet of the student in the previous year's class, Certificate issued by the Principal of studying in the current session.

faqs.question: Will the student get scholarship every month?
faqs.answer: No, The amount will be payable in lump sum annually.

faqs.question: May working person also apply for this scheme?
faqs.answer: No, this scholarship is only for students.
